item.title: ASP-Assisted Symbolic Regression: Uncovering Hidden Physics in Fluid Mechanics
item.description: arXiv:2507.17777v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Unlike conventional Machine-Learning (ML) approaches, often criticized as "black boxes", Symbolic Regression (SR) stands out as a powerful tool for revealing interpretable mathematical relationships in complex physical systems, requiring no a priori a...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> alignment, tool, study, analysis, framework | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
